name: Alonen't
description:
Alonen't is a game about sticking together and asking for help.

Wolves bully you and other dogs. The more you help fellow dogs, the more they will stay with you. If you ask for help, you can attract foxes to come and protect you. With a large enough group, wolves may not even want to bully anymore.

Created for Stay Safe! 2020
Theme: Solidarity
Time limit: 48 hours

Horace RIBOUT

Cassandre GABARD - @Muad'Dib
